data.actual_result: Browser windows refuse to open, not allowing you to add connections
data.expected_result: Browser window opens the 6th time with the selected connection
data.short_description: Opening and closing browser windows for 5 connections prevent any other browser windows from being opening
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into user settings - Go to connections and tap “Add” - Tap on any connection that will open a browser window (Everything except Xbox Live) - Close the browser window - Repeat steps 3 and 4 for four more connections - Attempt to tap on a connection for the 6th time
